title: Cyclical shifts of words
content: A word/string can be regarded as "necklace" by connecting the two ends of the word/string together (see Wikipedia "Necklace (combinatorics)", ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Necklace_(combinatorics) ). Two strings are regarded as the same necklace if one string can be rotated/circularly shifted/cyclically shifted to obtain the second string. To cope with words in the sense of necklaces, the rotation/cyclic shift ` cyclShift ` is defined as the basic operation, see ~ df-csh . The main theorems in this section are about counting the number of different necklaces resulting from cyclically shifting a given word, see ~ cshwrepswhash1 for words consisting of identical symbols and ~ cshwshash for words having lengths which are prime numbers.

df-csh
blocks.content: Perform a cyclical shift for an arbitrary class. Meaningful only for words ` w e. Word S ` or at least functions over half-open ranges of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-May-2018.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro/Alexander van der Vekens/ Gerard Lang, 17-Nov-2018.) (Revised by AV, 4-Nov-2022.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-csh(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccsh, cmpo(s0, s3, cab(s1, wrex(s2, cn0, wfn(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s2))))), cz, cif(emptycls, co(co(cv(s0), csubstr, cop(co(cv(s3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), cconcat, co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(cv(s3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-csh(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ cyclShift =(s0 ∈ { s1 | ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0, s1[Fn](0[..^]s2))}, s3 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 = ∅, ∅,((s0[substr]<(s3[mod](# ` s0)),(# ` s0)>)[++](s0[prefix](s3[mod](# ` s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

axiom df-cshOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ cyclShiftOLD =(s0 ∈ { s1 | ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0, s1[Fn](0[..^]s2))}, s3 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 = ∅, ∅,((s0[substr]<(s3[mod](# ` s0)),(# ` s0)>)[++](s0[substr]< 0,(s3[mod](# ` s0))>))))

  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: cshfn
blocks.content: Perform a cyclical shift for a function over a half-open range of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by AV, 20-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Nov-2018.) (Revised by AV, 4-Nov-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cshfn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cn0, wfn(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c1), cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cn0, wfn(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s1))))), c1, cz, ccsh, cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)), cif(emptycls, co(co(cv(hs0), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cv(hs0)))), cconcat, co(cv(hs0), cpfx, co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  ifbieq2d(emptycls, co(co(cv(hs0), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cv(hs0)))), cconcat, co(cv(hs0), cpfx, co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))))), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls)
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cv(hs0)))), cconcat, co(cv(hs0), cpfx, co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0)))), co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), c0, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  opeq12d(co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cpfx, co(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), c0, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq12d(cv(hs1), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(chash, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cfv(chash, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, chash)
  df-csh(hs0, s0, s1, hs1)
  ifex(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  0ex()
  ovex(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cn0, wfn(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cn0, wfn(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c1, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cshfn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))} ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[cyclShift]c1)= if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))}, c1, cz, ccsh, if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0))))), if(hs0 = ∅, ∅,((hs0[substr]<(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>)[++](hs0[prefix](hs1[mod](# ` hs0))))))
  ifbieq2d(emptycls, ((hs0[substr]<(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>)[++](hs0[prefix](hs1[mod](# ` hs0)))), ((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0)))), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs0 = ∅, c0 = ∅)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (hs0 = ∅ ↔ c0 = ∅))
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, emptycls)
  oveq12d((hs0[substr]<(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>), cconcat, (hs0[prefix](hs1[mod](# ` hs0))), (c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), (c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0))), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  oveq12d(hs0, csubstr, <(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>, c0, <(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  opeq12d((hs1[mod](# ` hs0)), (# ` hs0), (c1[mod](# ` c0)), (# ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  oveq12d(hs0, cpfx, (hs1[mod](# ` hs0)), c0, (c1[mod](# ` c0)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  oveq12d(hs1, cmo, (# ` hs0), c1, (# ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (# ` hs0)=(# ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, chash)
  df-csh(hs0, s0, s1, hs1)
  ifex(emptycls, ((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0)))), c0 = ∅)
  0ex()
  ovex((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), cconcat, (c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))})
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))})
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c1[mod](# ` c0))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm cshfnOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))} ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[cyclShiftOLD]c1)= if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))}, c1, cz, ccshOLD, if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>))), if(hs0 = ∅, ∅,((hs0[substr]<(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>)[++](hs0[substr]< 0,(hs1[mod](# ` hs0))>))))
  ifbieq2d(emptycls, ((hs0[substr]<(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>)[++](hs0[substr]< 0,(hs1[mod](# ` hs0))>)), ((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs0 = ∅, c0 = ∅)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (hs0 = ∅ ↔ c0 = ∅))
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, emptycls)
  oveq12d((hs0[substr]<(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>), cconcat, (hs0[substr]< 0,(hs1[mod](# ` hs0))>), (c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), (c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  oveq12d(hs0, csubstr, <(hs1[mod](# ` hs0)),(# ` hs0)>, c0, <(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  opeq12d((hs1[mod](# ` hs0)), (# ` hs0), (c1[mod](# ` c0)), (# ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  oveq12d(hs0, csubstr, < 0,(hs1[mod](# ` hs0))>, c0, < 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  opeq2d(nat0, (hs1[mod](# ` hs0)), (c1[mod](# ` c0)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  oveq12d(hs1, cmo, (# ` hs0), c1, (# ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (# ` hs0)=(# ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, chash)
  df-cshOLD(hs0, s0, s1, hs1)
  ifex(emptycls, ((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>)), c0 = ∅)
  0ex()
  ovex((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), cconcat, (c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))})
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ0, s0[Fn](0[..^]s1))})
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c1[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[substr]< 0,(c1[mod](# ` c0))>))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cshword
blocks.content: Perform a cyclical shift for a word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cshword(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls))), wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))), wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, cn0, wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), c1)))
  iswrd(hs1, c0, c1)
  reximi(hs1, cn0, wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), c1), wfn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))
  ffn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), c1)
  elabg(hs0, c0, cword(c1), wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))
  rexbidv(hs1, cn0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))), wfn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))
  fneq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))
  cshfn(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  pm2.61ian(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  eqtrd(cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), emptycls, wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  adantr(wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)), emptycls))
  iftrue(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6req(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), co(emptycls, cconcat, emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  adantr(wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), co(emptycls, cconcat, emptycls)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), emptycls, emptycls, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6eq(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), emptycls, co(emptycls, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0)))
  swrd0(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), emptycls, co(emptycls, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  pfx0(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  ccatidid()
  adantr(wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(cif(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls)), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  iffalse(emptycls, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

thm cshword(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[cyclShift]c2)=((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[cyclShift]c2), ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))))), (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  sylan(c0 ∈ Word(c1), c2 ∈ ℤ, (c0[cyclShift]c2)= if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))))), c0 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))})
  mpbird(c0 ∈ Word(c1), c0 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))}, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, c0[Fn](0[..^]hs1)))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ Word(c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, c0[Fn](0[..^]hs1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0,(c0 :(0[..^]hs1)→ c1)))
  iswrd(hs1, c0, c1)
  reximi(hs1, cn0, (c0 :(0[..^]hs1)→ c1), c0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))
  ffn(c0, (0[..^]hs1), c1)
  elabg(hs0, c0, Word(c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, c0[Fn](0[..^]hs1)))
  rexbidv(hs1, cn0, hs0 = c0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1), c0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))
  fneq1(hs0, c0, (0[..^]hs1))
  cshfn(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  pm2.61ian((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))=((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), c0 = ∅)
  eqtrd(if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))))), ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), emptycls, (c0 = ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  adantr(c0 = ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))= ∅)
  iftrue(emptycls, ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), c0 = ∅)
  syl6req(emptycls, ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), (∅[++]∅), (c0 = ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  adantr(c0 = ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))))=(∅[++]∅))
  oveq12d((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), cconcat, (c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))), emptycls, emptycls, c0 = ∅)
  syl6eq((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), emptycls, (∅[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), c0 = ∅)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, csubstr, <(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)
  swrd0((c2[mod](# ` c0)), (# ` c0))
  syl6eq((c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))), emptycls, (∅[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))), c0 = ∅)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, cpfx, (c2[mod](# ` c0)))
  pfx0((c2[mod](# ` c0)))
  ccatidid()
  adantr(¬ c0 = ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), if(c0 = ∅, ∅,((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))=((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))
  iffalse(emptycls, ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), c0 = ∅)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, c0[Fn](0[..^]hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: cshnz
blocks.content: A cyclical shift is the empty set if the number of shifts is not an integer. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm cshnz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wceq(co(c1, ccsh, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  sylancr(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wceq(co(c1, ccsh, c0), emptycls), wceq(cdm(ccsh), cxp(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))), cz)), wn(wa(wcel(c1, cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, cz))))
  dmmpt2(hs2, hs3, ccsh, cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))), cz, cif(emptycls, co(co(cv(hs2), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs2))), cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), cconcat, co(cv(hs2), cpfx, co(cv(hs3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs2), emptycls)))
  df-csh(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3)
  ifex(emptycls, co(co(cv(hs2), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs2))), cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), cconcat, co(cv(hs2), cpfx, co(cv(hs3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs2), emptycls))
  0ex()
  ovex(co(cv(hs2), csubstr, cop(co(cv(hs3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs2))), cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))), cconcat, co(cv(hs2), cpfx, co(cv(hs3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(hs2)))))
  intnand(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wcel(c1, cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, cz))
  id(wn(wcel(c0, cz)))
  ndmovg(ccsh, cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))), cz, c1, c0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs2.c(cz)
  diff.hs3.c(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wfn(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs3.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
}

thm cshnz(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ ℤ →(c1[cyclShift]c0)= ∅)
} = {
  sylancr(¬ c0 ∈ ℤ, (c1[cyclShift]c0)= ∅, dom(cyclShift)=({ hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))} × ℤ), ¬(c1 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))} ∧ c0 ∈ ℤ))
  dmmpt2(hs2, hs3, ccsh, { hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))}, cz, if(hs2 = ∅, ∅,((hs2[substr]<(hs3[mod](# ` hs2)),(# ` hs2)>)[++](hs2[prefix](hs3[mod](# ` hs2))))))
  df-csh(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3)
  ifex(emptycls, ((hs2[substr]<(hs3[mod](# ` hs2)),(# ` hs2)>)[++](hs2[prefix](hs3[mod](# ` hs2)))), hs2 = ∅)
  0ex()
  ovex((hs2[substr]<(hs3[mod](# ` hs2)),(# ` hs2)>), cconcat, (hs2[prefix](hs3[mod](# ` hs2))))
  intnand(¬ c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))}, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  id(¬ c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ndmovg(ccsh, { hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))}, cz, c1, c0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c({ hs0 | ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0[Fn](0[..^]hs1))})
  diff.hs2.c(cz)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
}

  3eqtrd(co(c0, ccsh, nat0), c0, co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(nat0, cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, nat0)), co(c0, cconcat, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wne(emptycls, c0)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, ccsh, nat0), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(nat0, cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, nat0)), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(nat0, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(nat0, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wne(emptycls, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wne(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, nat0), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(nat0, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(nat0, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, nat0), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(nat0, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(nat0, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wcel(nat0, cz))

blocks.name: cshwmodn
blocks.content: Cyclically shifting a word is invariant regarding modulo the word's length. (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 16-Oct-2022.)

thm cshwmodn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
} = {
  pm2.61ine(c0, emptycls, wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  a1d(wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  3eqtr4a(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), co(emptycls, ccsh, c2), emptycls, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  0csh0(c2)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, ccsh, c2)
  syl6eq(co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), emptycls, co(emptycls, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  0csh0(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  ex(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  3eqtr4rd(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  syl2anc(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wceq(co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(c2, cz))
  oveq12d(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(c2, cz)))
  oveq2d(c0, csubstr, cop(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0)), cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(c2, cz)))
  opeq1d(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0), co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(c2, cz)))
  oveq2d(c0, cpfx, co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(c2, cz)))
  syl2anr(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp))
  zre(c2)
  nnrp(cfv(chash, c0))
  modabs2(c2, cfv(chash, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cz))
  simprl(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))
  nn0zd(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  zmodcld(c2, cfv(chash, c0), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  simprr(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))
  impcom(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  lennncl(c0, c1)
  cshword(c0, c1, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))))
  cshword(c0, c1, c2)
}

thm cshwmodn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[cyclShift]c2)=(c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61ine(c0, emptycls, ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[cyclShift]c2)=(c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))
  a1d(c0 = ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[cyclShift]c2)=(c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))))
  3eqtr4a((c0[cyclShift]c2), (c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))), (∅[cyclShift]c2), emptycls, c0 = ∅)
  0csh0(c2)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, ccsh, c2)
  syl6eq((c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))), emptycls, (∅[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))), c0 = ∅)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, ccsh, (c2[mod](# ` c0)))
  0csh0((c2[mod](# ` c0)))
  ex(c0 ≠ ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[cyclShift]c2)=(c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))))
  3eqtr4rd((c0[cyclShift]c2), (c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0))), ((c0[substr]<((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix]((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)))), ((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  syl2anc((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)), ((c0[substr]<((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix]((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0))))=((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))), (# ` c0)∈ ℕ, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  oveq12d((c0[substr]<((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), cconcat, (c0[prefix]((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0))), (c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>), (c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0))), ((# ` c0)∈ ℕ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  oveq2d(c0, csubstr, <((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>, <(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>, ((# ` c0)∈ ℕ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  opeq1d(((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)), (# ` c0), (c2[mod](# ` c0)), ((# ` c0)∈ ℕ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  oveq2d(c0, cpfx, ((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)), (c2[mod](# ` c0)), ((# ` c0)∈ ℕ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  syl2anr((# ` c0)∈ ℕ, c2 ∈ ℤ, ((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0))=(c2[mod](# ` c0)), c2 ∈ ℝ, (# ` c0)∈ ℝ+)
  zre(c2)
  nnrp((# ` c0))
  modabs2(c2, (# ` c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)), (c0[cyclShift](c2[mod](# ` c0)))=((c0[substr]<((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix]((c2[mod](# ` c0))[mod](# ` c0)))), c0 ∈ Word(c1), (c2[mod](# ` c0))∈ ℤ)
  simprl(c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ Word(c1), c2 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0zd((c2[mod](# ` c0)), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  zmodcld(c2, (# ` c0), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧(c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  simprr(c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ Word(c1), c2 ∈ ℤ)
  impcom(c0 ≠ ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (# ` c0)∈ ℕ)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Word(c1), c2 ∈ ℤ, (c0 ≠ ∅ →(# ` c0)∈ ℕ))
  ex(c0 ∈ Word(c1), c0 ≠ ∅, (# ` c0)∈ ℕ)
  lennncl(c0, c1)
  cshword(c0, c1, (c2[mod](# ` c0)))
  adantl(c0 ≠ ∅, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[cyclShift]c2)=((c0[substr]<(c2[mod](# ` c0)),(# ` c0)>)[++](c0[prefix](c2[mod](# ` c0)))))
  cshword(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: cshwsublen
blocks.content: Cyclically shifting a word is invariant regarding subtraction of the word's length. (Contributed by AV, 3-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm cshwsublen(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0)))))

  pm2.61ine(cfv(chash, c0), nat0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0))))))

  oveq2(cfv(chash, c0), nat0, c2, cmin)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c2, cmin, nat0), c2))
  subid1d(c2, wcel(c2, cz))
  zcn(c2)
  ex(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0))), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), co(c0, ccsh, co(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  oveq2d(c0, ccsh, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  syl2an2(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(co(c2, cmin, cfv(chash, c0)), cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c2, cr))
  zre(c2)
  impcom(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wi(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wi(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  ex(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp))
  sylbir(wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  elnnne0(cfv(chash, c0))

thm cshwn(class c0, class c1) {

  0csh0(cfv(chash, c0))
  oveq1(emptycls, c0, ccsh, cfv(chash, c0))
  id(wceq(emptycls, c0))

  3eqtrd(co(c0, ccsh, cfv(chash, c0)), c0, co(c0, ccsh, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), co(c0, ccsh, nat0), wa(wne(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1))))

  mpdan(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, cfv(chash, c0)), co(c0, ccsh, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cz))
  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
  lencl(c0, c1)
  cshwmodn(c0, c1, cfv(chash, c0))
  oveq2d(c0, ccsh, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0, wa(wne(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1))))
  syl(wa(wne(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1))), wceq(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), crp))

  adantl(wne(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, nat0), c0))

  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), cword(c1)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(co(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cconcat, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))), cword(c1)), wcel(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), cword(c1)), wcel(co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))), cword(c1)))
  swrdcl(c0, c1, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))
  pfxcl(c0, c1, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  ccatcl(co(c0, csubstr, cop(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(chash, c0))), c1, co(c0, cpfx, co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  a1d(wn(wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(co(c0, ccsh, c2), cword(c1)))

blocks.name: cshwf
blocks.content: A cyclically shifted word is a function from a half-open range of integers of the same length as the word as domain to the set of symbols for the word. (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshwfn
blocks.content: A cyclically shifted word is a function with a half-open range of integers of the same length as the word as domain. (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshwrn
blocks.content: The range of a cyclically shifted word is a subset of the set of symbols for the word. (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshwidxmod
blocks.content: The symbol at a given index of a cyclically shifted nonempty word is the symbol at the shifted index of the original word. (Contributed by AV, 13-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 21-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: cshwidx0mod

} = {
  eqtrd(((c0[cyclShift]c2)` 0), (c0 `(c2[mod](# ` c0))), (c0 `((0[+]c2)[mod](# ` c0))), (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))

  simp1(c0 ∈ Word(c1), c0 ≠ ∅, c2 ∈ ℤ)

  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ Word(c1), c0 ≠ ∅, c2 ∈ ℤ, (0[+]c2)= c2)

blocks.name: cshinj

blocks.name: 2cshw
blocks.content: Cyclically shifting a word two times. (Contributed by AV, 7-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 4-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 31-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: 2cshwid
blocks.content: Cyclically shifting a word two times resulting in the word itself. (Contributed by AV, 7-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)

thm 2cshwid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(co(c0, ccsh, c2), ccsh, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2)), co(c0, ccsh, co(c2, caddc, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2)))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2), cz))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2), cz), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cz))
  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
  zsubcl(cfv(chash, c0), c2)
  2cshw(c0, c1, c2, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2))
  oveq2d(c0, ccsh, co(c2, caddc, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2)), cfv(chash, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c2, caddc, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, c2)), cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cc))
  zcn(c2)
  nn0cnd(cfv(chash, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
  lencl(c0, c1)
  pncan3(c2, cfv(chash, c0))

blocks.name: lswcshw

blocks.origin:
thm cshwleneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c3), co(c2, ccsh, c4))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2), cfv(chash, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), cfv(chash, co(c2, ccsh, c4)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c3), co(c2, ccsh, c4))))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c3), co(c2, ccsh, c4)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, co(c0, ccsh, c3))))
  eqcomd(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz))))

  cshwlen(c0, c1, c3)
  3ad2ant3(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c3), co(c2, ccsh, c4)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), cfv(chash, co(c2, ccsh, c4))))
  fveq2(co(c0, ccsh, c3), co(c2, ccsh, c4), chash)
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c3), co(c2, ccsh, c4)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c2, ccsh, c4)), cfv(chash, c2)))

blocks.name: 3cshw

blocks.name: cshweqdifid
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word by two positions results in the same word, cyclically shifting the word by the difference of these two positions results in the original word itself. (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshweqrep
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word by L position results in the word itself, the symbol at any position is repeated at multiples of L (modulo the length of the word) positions in the word. (Contributed by AV, 13-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshw1
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word by 1 position results in the word itself, the word is build of identical symbols. Remark: also "valid" for an empty word! (Contributed by AV, 13-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cshw1repsw
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word by 1 position results in the word itself, the word is a "repeated symbol word". Remark: also "valid" for an empty word! (Contributed by AV, 8-Nov-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshwsexa
blocks.content: The class of (different!) words resulting by cyclically shifting something (not necessarily a word) is a set. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jun-2018.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro/AV, 25-Oct-2018.)

thm cshwsexa(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ { s0 ∈ Word(c0)| ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)} ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqeltri({ s0 ∈ Word(c0)| ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)}, universe, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1))∧(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)))})
  3eqtri({ s0 ∈ Word(c0)| ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1))∧(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)))}, { s0 |(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧ ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0))}, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0))})
  df-rab(s0, Word(c0), ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0))
  abbii(s0, (s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧ ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)), ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)))
  bicomi((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧ ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)), ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)))
  r19.42v(s1, (0[..^](# ` c1)), s0 ∈ Word(c0), (c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)
  abbii(s0, ∃(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)),(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1))∧(s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0))))
  df-rex(s1, (0[..^](# ` c1)), (s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0))
  zfrep4(s0, s1, hs0, s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)), (s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0))
  ovexi({ s1 | s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1))}, nat0, cfzo, (# ` c1))
  abid2(s1, (0[..^](# ` c1)))
  mp1i(s1 ∈(0[..^](# ` c1)), ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)→ s0 = hs0))), (T ∧ T))
  pm3.2i(wtru, wtru)
  tru()
  imp(wtru, wtru, ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)→ s0 = hs0))))
  spcimedv(hs0, (c1[cyclShift]s1), universe, wtru, wtru, ∀(s0,((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)→ s0 = hs0)))
  ovexd(c1, ccsh, s1, wtru)
  ex((T ∧ hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1)), wtru, ∀(s0,((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)→ s0 = hs0)))
  alrimiv(s0, ((T ∧ hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1))∧ T), ((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)→ s0 = hs0))
  ad2antlr(wtru, hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1), wtru, ((s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0)→ s0 = hs0))
  com12(hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1), (s0 ∈ Word(c0)∧(c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0), s0 = hs0)
  adantl(s0 ∈ Word(c0), (c1[cyclShift]s1)= s0, (hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1)→ s0 = hs0))
  eqcoms((c1[cyclShift]s1), s0, (hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1)→ s0 = hs0))
  ex(s0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1), hs0 =(c1[cyclShift]s1), s0 = hs0)
  eqtr3(s0, (c1[cyclShift]s1), hs0)

blocks.name: 2cshwcshw
blocks.content: If a word is a cyclically shifted word, and a second word is the result of cyclically shifting the same word, then the second word is the result of cyclically shifting the first word. (Contributed by AV, 11-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2cshwcshw(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wi(w3a(wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wceq(c4, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c0, ccsh, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c4, ccsh, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wi(w3a(wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wceq(c4, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c0, ccsh, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c4, ccsh, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  com12(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wceq(c4, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c0, ccsh, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c4, ccsh, cv(s1)))))
  3imp(wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wceq(c4, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c0, ccsh, cv(s0)))), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wrex(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c4, ccsh, cv(s1))))))
  com24(wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wceq(c4, co(c0, ccsh, c3)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c0, ccsh, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wrex(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c2), wceq(c5, co(c4, ccsh, cv(s1)))))

blocks.name: scshwfzeqfzo
blocks.content: For a nonempty word the sets of shifted words, expressd by a finite interval of integers or by a half-open integer range are identical. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jun-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cshwcshid
blocks.content: A cyclically shifted word can be reconstructed by cyclically shifting it again. Lemma for ~ erclwwlksym and ~ erclwwlknsym . (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Nov-2018.)

thm cshwcshid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, cv(s3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cword(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), cfv(chash, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, cv(s3)))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, cv(s3)))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, cv(s3)))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  ex(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0)))), wrex(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, cv(s3)))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0))))), wrex(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, cv(s3)))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), cmin, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), ccsh, co(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  impcom(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), ccsh, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), cmin, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2)))))

blocks.name: cshwcsh2id
blocks.content: A cyclically shifted word can be reconstructed by cyclically shifting it again twice. Lemma for ~ erclwwlktr and ~ erclwwlkntr . (Contributed by AV, 9-Apr-2018.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cshimadifsn
blocks.content: The image of a cyclically shifted word under its domain without its left bound is the image of a cyclically shifted word under its domain without the number of shifted symbols. (Contributed by AV, 19-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cshimadifsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: cshimadifsn0
blocks.content: The image of a cyclically shifted word under its domain without its upper bound is the image of a cyclically shifted word under its domain without the number of shifted symbols. (Contributed by AV, 19-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cshimadifsn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))), wceq(cima(c0, cdif(co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c3))), cima(co(c0, ccsh, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c2, cmin, nat1)))))
} = {
